name: Project: World Doors
blurb: We need a new kind of game. Something we can play with the WORLD! This game will be available on iOS, Android, and Facebook!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Hey, thanks for backing our project! This backing will get us started. It has 3 rewards available. The 3 players who choose this backing can create their own Skin to decorate their ball, or tell us what you would like and we'll create it for you. These 3 players will also spend one whole day in The Room!
------- SOUTHERN IDAHO -------\r\nWater Ball - Just for you Twin Falls and Southern Idaho! This Ball will be clear blue and will have the appearance of holding water inside!
Global Event: Choose the date in 2014 when the 1st Game Quake happens.
------- CREATE YOUR BALL ------- \r\nCreate your own Skin to decorate your Ball... or tell us what you would like and we'll create it for you. Must be appropriate!

------- NAME THE CAT ------- \r\nFor this backing of $6, you can submit your idea for the Cat's name! Once we have all submissions printed out on cards, we will tie a treat to the back of each. We will then let our company cat, yes we have one of those, choose which card to flip over. The one he chooses will be the name of the Cat character in the game. We will record this and put it on our website and YouTube for all to see. If your idea is chosen, we will also include you in the credits of the game and invite you to play in the Hill Mansion with us on the day the game comes out!
------- SPECIAL BALL ------- \r\nSpecial Edition X-Ray Skin - Decorate your Ball with this special Skin that allows you to see Hidden Objects!
------- COLOR PACK: RED -------\r\nDecorate Your Ball - Limited Skin Color Pack: Red.  These Color Packs come with 5 different Skins that vary in design for each color.
------- COLOR PACK: GREEN ------- \r\nDecorate Your Ball - Limited Skin Color Pack: Green

------- SPECIAL BALL ------- \r\nLimited Edition: Special Skin for your Character! With this backing of $10, we will give you access to the Key Skin to decorate your Ball character. When your Ball wears this Skin, you will be able to enter a secret door, hidden inside each of the Mansions.

------- COLOR PACK: RAINBOW -------  \r\nDecorate Your Ball - Unlimited Rainbow Color Pack. (Ball continuously emits rainbow colors, great for Night Levels!) Choose a favorite color for your Rainbow Skin and your ball will glow that color when the Cat is near!
------- THE MANSION PACK ------- \r\nUnlock the Moon Mansion, The Haunted Forest Mansion, and the Under Water Mansion!
------- GAME QUAKE: EVENT -------  \r\nDecide which of the 3 events will take place when the 1st Game Quake happens.
------ BRONCO NATION -------\r\nA Blue and Orange Ball just for you, Bronco Nation!
------- COLOR PACK: BLUE -------  \r\nDecorate Your Ball - Limited Skin Color Pack: Blue (Only Available Through This Backing!)

------- YOU DECIDE: ANIMAL -------  \r\nWe have to decide what animal will be the gate keeper for one of the levels inside the Hill Mansion. It has to be a land animal. With this backing, we will let you decide which animal will be the gate keeper for this level. Choose well.
------- NAME THE HUSKY -------  \r\nName the Husky! Submit 5 ideas, we will choose 1.

------- SPECIAL PET -------  \r\nWith this backing of $12 we will give you one of the special dogs: Husky! The Husky Dog will chase off the Cat when he comes to steal your points, just like all the other dogs, but the Husky has a special ability in snow levels! The Husky cannot be bought from the in-game store. She must be found. With this backing we will also let you choose the color of your Husky's collar.

------- SPECIAL PET -------  \r\nWith this backing of $13 we will give you the Eagle! This pet is handy if the Cat steals your points because you can call the Eagle to go get your points back! This backing also comes with 500 Free Points.
------- NAME THE EAGLE -------  \r\nName the Eagle! Submit 5 ideas, we will choose 1.

---- KICKSTARTER: BALL PACK ----  \r\nFor this backing of $15, we will give you access to a special set of Skins to decorate your Ball character with. These Skins are only available through this one time Kickstarter offer. These Skins come in many different colors and designs, you will love them!
------- YOU DECIDE -------  \r\nChoose the geographical location for us to place the button that causes the 1st Game Quake.
------- SPECIAL BALL ------- \r\nCrystal Ball - The Crystal Ball has special abilities in some levels.

PLANT - Southern Idaho PLANT members and fans, help support the creation of this game with $20 (or more!) and we'll create a section of the game just for Twin Falls where players can visit virtual PLANT businesses inside the game!
------- DEMO -------  \r\nFor a backing of $20, we will invite you to experience the demo of World Doors, before the game goes live on Facebook. We will also give you 500 Free Points!
------- YOU DECIDE -------  \r\nChoose the geographical location for the 2014 New Years Eve Party!
------- MANSION -------  \r\nUnder Water Mansion - With this backing the Under Water Mansion will be unlocked for you to use in the game. Invite your Facebook friends over to explore the levels.
------- ORIGINAL ARTWORK -------  \r\nReceive one of the original sketches from the first designing phase.

------- GOLDEN PICK -------  \r\nFor this backing of $25 we will give you one of the limited Golden Picks. This Golden Pick is hard to find. It is the Logo of the game for this reason. Golden Picks are special because they can be used as a key to unlock any of the "special" doors in the game, such as an additional Mansion! When the game starts, they will be extremely hard to find. Get one here on Kickstarter!

------- SPECIAL MANSION -------  \r\nLimited Edition: Under Water Mansion! For a backing of $30, we will give you Early access to a Special Under Water Mansion. This Special version of the Under Water Mansion will also be yours, unlocked for you to invite your friends to once the Mansion is live for everyone. We will also give you an extra 500 Free Points!
------- MEGA MANSION -------  \r\nTree House Mansion - This is the second Mega Mansion. With this backing the Tree House Mansion will be unlocked for your use when it comes out!

------- DESIGN A ROOM -------  \r\nAs the game evolves, more and more Mansions will be available for play. There will also be Mega Mansions! These Mansions and Mega Mansions are going to need rooms inside for people to play in. With this backing of $50, you can design one of the rooms inside an upcoming Mega Mansion. Make it your own, hide your 'Hidden Door" however you like! Artistic ability does not matter, we can turn stick figures into gold. We will also include you in the credits. This backing comes with an additional 500 Free Points as well.

------- THE ROOM -------  \r\nBe one of the first 3 players to appear at the top of the World Lobby window. This means you will be one of the first 3 players to enter The Room! The Room is where special decisions are made for everyone in the game. ALSO COMES WITH A GOLDEN PICK!

------- ULTIMATE PACK -------  \r\nThis backing comes with 1000 Free Points, a Golden Pick, an invite to play the Demo, the 1st Mega Mansion, and a Special Skin for your Ball, or design your Ball yourself!
------- COLOR PACK: BLACK -------  \r\nSpecial Skin - Pure Black, or 8 Ball.
------- MANSION -------  Haunted Forest Mansion - Unlocked for you to use in the game.

------- SPECIAL MANSION -------  \r\nLimited Edition: Haunted Forest Mansion! For a backing of $55, we will give you Early access to a Special Haunted Forest Mansion. The Mansion will also be yours, unlocked for you to invite your friends to once the Mansion is live for everyone. This backing comes with an additional 1000 Free Points!

---- ULTIMATE PACK: SKINS ----  \r\nFor this backing of $60, we will invite you to play the demo before the game goes live, give you each of the special Skins that can be found only through backing our project, we will also give you one of the limited Golden Picks, and 1000 Free Points to use in the game when it comes out!

------- MEGA MANSION -------  \r\nMega Mansion 1 - MYSTERY MANSION\r\nWe are currently designing the first few Mega Mansions. With this backing of $75 we will give you the first Mega Mansion when it comes out. This backing comes with an additional 1000 Free Points! IT ALSO COMES WITH A GOLDEN PICK!

------- CREATE A LEVEL -------  \r\nOur levels are as creative as the imagination allows. Each of our levels has this one thing in common, they each have 4 doors. Three of the doors are visible, and 1 door is hidden. With this backing of $100, we will let you design a level that we will use in a future Mansion. We will send you the instructions on how to design these levels, and information on door placement. We will also include you in the credits. This backing comes with an additional 1000 Free Points!

---- ULTIMATE MANSION PACK ----  \r\nFor a backing of $150, we will give you early access to a Special version of the Haunted Forest Mansion, the first Mega Mansion, and the Tree House Mega Mansion. All 3 will be yours, unlocked for your use. Also, we will invite you to play the Demo with us, and give you one of the limited Golden Picks! This backing comes with an additional 1500 Free Points!

------- GAME CHANGER -------  \r\nThere is ONE door inside the Hill Mansion that will unlock the portal. There is ONE door that will change the game for everyone. We will tell you the location of the secret doors inside the Hill Mansion. These doors allow you to enter a room where only a few people will ever be able to enter, it is hidden that well. Inside there are 3 Special Skins available to whoever finds these doors! These Skins cannot be found anywhere else, and they have a special ability! With this backing, we will give you one of these Skins in addition to telling you where the door is...

------- GLOBAL EVENT -------  \r\nIn World Doors, there will be Global Events that take place periodically. With this backing, we will come play with you on the day of the first Global Event. When this day comes, being in the right place at the right time could be very, very rewarding!

------ CREATE A MANSION! -----  \r\nFor a backing of $1200, we will be in touch to help you design your own Mansion. The catch is, you have to agree to let us make your mansion available to the world. We will also include you in the credits, invite you to play the demo with us, and give you one of the limited Golden Picks!

---- CREATE A MEGA MANSION ----  \r\nFor this backing, we will be in touch to help you design your very own Mega Mansion! Your Mega Mansion will be private, unavailable to the general public. Only you can invite Facebook friends over to come explore your Mansion. This Mega Mansion comes with 12 main rooms, a front yard, a back yard, and 5 Secret Rooms. Invite up to 10 friends over to your Mega Mansion at a time!

------- THE GLOBAL EVENT -------  \r\nThe Global Event! As you know, in this game there will be global events. One in particular that will change the game for everyone. This event takes place when a player finds a secret door, enters the room, and pushes a button. With this backing we will tell you where that room is, and the details of how the door opens to let this happen. We will also come play with you when this takes place...
